name: Control (itch)
description:
Control is a look at how guns can behave in the world.

We wanted to make something about what people can expect to happen when a gun is in their hands. Control is where you can act with intent regarding the people in front of you. Control is where you can also focus and reflect on the people in front of you.

Controls:

  • Mouse - aim the weapon
  • Left mouse button - fire

Control is the seventh Chalk In Jam, a prototype built during the 25th week of 2016 by Chalk In Rain.

Chalk In Rain is:

  • Emre Deniz - @Emre_C_Deniz
  • Gerard Delaney - @verbvirus
